job_title: Food Service in Sault Ste. Marie, MI
pros: Coworkers are fun to work with.  New people coming in quite often.  Only open during meal hours so rarely ever miss classes.
cons: Management are rude and straight up mean to most of their employees.  I work in the QuaterDeck which is the main dining hall on campus and it is awful.  Workers are always mad because we most likely just got done getting yelled at by our boss.  Not only is this area frusterating to work in, it is also gross.  The QuaterDeck has already failed a recent health inspection, and I'm sure will fail another one soon.

job_title: Research Assistant in Sault Ste. Marie, MI
pros: Coworkers are nice to work with. Most of the professors are laid back and realize the students have to come first.
cons: Politics, toxic culture that has taken hold over the years. Administration truly have no idea what they are doing and make decisions without consulting faculty or students-a prime example of this is the elimination of the 8am classes without gathering feedback first. Administrators know the institution is operating on borrowed time and are spinning their wheels trying to find any possible way to halt the rapid decline in enrollment.

review_title: I worked here as a student employee
job_title: Lifeguard in Sault Ste. Marie, MI
pros: Works around my class schedule and automatically gives time off for breaks from school so I don't need to find a replacement.
cons: Total lack of communication from management to lower level employees.  Head lifeguard was not fit for management but was given the position anyways.  Not paid enough, as the only job on campus that requires extra certification, the lifeguards should make more than minimum wage.

job_title: Administrative Professional in Sault Ste. Marie, MI
pros: Caring faculty, support staff is wonderful and caring for students.  The campus is beautiful and is based at a former fort.  Student support is exceptional with personalized support from faculty.
cons: Budget deficits have resulted in major cuts in staffing.  Pay is low.
